alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL HARDING, WEST CENTRAL UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN COLFAX COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farley, or 29 miles south of Des Moines, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gladstone and Farley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County
